SubSection_PgfTag.SubSection_text: If the whole of a transitional chargeable period falls within a financial year listed in column 1 of the table (for corporation tax purposes) or a tax year listed in column 2 of the table (for income tax purposes), the writing-down allowance to which the person is entitled for that chargeable period is—

ListItem.SubSection_PgfTag: WDA is the writing-down allowance to which the person would be entitled for the chargeable period apart from this section, and
P is the percentage specified in relation to that year in column 3 of the table.
